text: Come Drink with Me is a 1966 Hong Kong action fantasy movie directed by King Hu and starring Cheng Pei-pei, Yueh Hua, Chan Hung-lit, Ku Feng, Jackie Chan. It was distributed by Shaw Brothers Studio. ==Other websites== * * Category:1966 action movies Category:1966 fantasy movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong fantasy movies
title: Come Drink with Me
